name: Weapon Stabbed
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal")                --DO NOT CHANGE!
enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit")                        --DO NOT CHANGE!
if weaponattack == nil then weaponattack = {} end
if matches[2] == "claws" then
   table.insert(weaponattack, "your wickedly sharp claws")
elseif matches[2] == "vines" then
   table.insert(weaponattack, "the thorny vines covering your arms")
else
   table.insert(weaponattack, matches[2])
end
--display(weaponattack)
matches: ^You viciously jab (.*) into .*
^You viciously stab (.*) into .*
^You slice into the [\w'\-]+ [\w'\-]+ of [\w'\-]+ with (.*)\.$
^Lightning-quick, you jab .* with (.*).
^Lightning-quick, you stab .* with (.*).
^Lunging forward with long, flashing ([\w'\-]+) extended, you tear into the flesh of .*
^You slice into the [\w'\-]+ of [\w'\-]+ with (.*)\.$
^You flash (.*) in front of the eyes of ([\w'\-]+)
^You cock back your arm and throw (.*) at ([\w'\-]+)
^You slice into [\w'\-]+ with (.+)\.$
^Lunging forward with long, flashing ([\w'\-]+) extended, you tear into
^You swing (.*) at [\w'\-]+ with all your might.
^You slash into [\w'\-]+ with (.*)\.$
^You whip (.+) in a controlled arc at [\w'\-]+\.$
^You draw the blade of (.*) in an expert lateral slice across the head of [\w'\-]+\.$
^With your victim exposed\, you crack (.*) back for a second assault\.$
^You slash into [\w'\-]+\'s .* with (.*)\.$
^You swing (.*) at [\w'\-]+\'s .* with all your might\.$
^Taking hold of (.+) with a firm two-handed grip\, you hew savagely at [\w'\-]+\'s .+\.$
^Raising (.+) above your head\, you bring it down upon [\w'\-]+\'s head with terrible force\.$
^Bracing your feet\, you lunge upward at [\w'\-]+ with (.+)\.$
